resources.string: Конфигуриране на правата за това приложение
These storage permissions are needed for saving cache file, settings and save snapshots from the camera.
These location permissions are needed for Geofencing and to get the Wifi SSID\'s around you!
These phone state permissions are needed for enabling notifications!
These camera permissions are needed for scanning QR Codes!
These audio permissions are needed for Voice Recognition!
These fingerprint permissions are needed for enabling Fingerprint Security!
